alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; Harris; Heard; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Fayette, northwestern Meriwether, eastern Heard, Troup, Coweta and northwestern Harris Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Arnco-Sargent to Lakeview, and moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, LaGrange, Fayetteville, Franklin, Peachtree City, Tyrone, West Point, Senoia, Hogansville, Grantville, Luthersville, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, Lone Oak, East Newnan, Corinth, Mountville, Cannonville, and Louise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Coweta; Fayette; Harris; Heard; Meriwether; Troup
